first:
Hi {LEADER_NAME},

Last Saturday, I launched a weekly Classical Chess team battle (30') for the first time. And this first edition gathered more than 550 players: https://lichess.org/tournament/cNHWOrIZ ^^! I'm really hoping to exceed 1,000 players for the second one. That's why I would be so happy to have your team ({TEAM_NAME}) among ours.

Here is the link: lichess.org/tournament/{TOURNAMENT_ID} :).

multiple:
Hi {LEADER_NAME},

First, thank you so much for your teams participation to the first World Classicals Team Battle :). We reached more than 550 players and I'm really hoping to exceed 1,000 for the second one!

Your teams ({TEAM_NAME}) are obviously invited to join this second edition: lichess.org/tournament/{TOURNAMENT_ID} ;).

podium:
Hi {LEADER_NAME},

First, congratulations for your {RANK} place during the last World Classicals Team Battle! We reached more than 550 players and I'm really hoping to exceed 1,000 for the second one.

Your team ({TEAM_NAME}) is obviously invited to join this second edition: lichess.org/tournament/{TOURNAMENT_ID} ;).
